abstract: In a reversal of Thursday’s gains, Wall Street dropped sharply as high volume caused delays on trades reported by the NYSE.
snippet: In a reversal of Thursday’s gains, Wall Street dropped sharply as high volume caused delays on trades reported by the NYSE.
lead_paragraph: The trouble began the moment the opening bell sounded and ended, more than six hours later, with a stock market plunge that left frazzled traders biting their nails.

headline.main: Stocks Tumble on Consumer Weakness; Dow Down 2.5%
headline.print_headline: Markets Fall Back to Earth, and Hard
